CHAT.comment: CHAT format needs to be double-checked
screen time is elapsed time from beginning of visit in min:sec

u.a: C touches car where she has it
C pushes car; makes car noises
M looks in house for something
C searches among toys in house
C drops toy she was holding
C reaches in house and moves object
M stops C from getting something else from house
C picks up tray from pile of dishes
C puts her mouth on tray; M moves tray away from C's mouth; C stares at picture on tray
M points somewhere on table behind house
M seems to have pointed at fork behind house
M points at part of table where C pointed
C hands M a spoon; M spoons into cup
M holds spoon over C's cup
M spoons twice into C's cup
C picks up teapot and pours
